articles.author: Apoorva Mandavilli
articles.title: The Delta Variant Is the Symptom of a Bigger Threat: Vaccine Refusal - Yahoo! Voices
articles.description: There are almost as many reasons for vaccine hesitancy and refusal as there are unvaccinated Americans. But this problem, not the variant, lies at the root of rising infection rates.
articles.content:
Of the 39 percent of adults who are unvaccinated, about half say they are completely unwilling. But even within that group, some say they would comply if required to do so.
